feed.title: Sink Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Sink: v0.1.0
entry.content:
âœ¨ Features

  • URL Shortening: Compress your URLs to their minimal length.
  • Analytics: Monitor link analytics and gather insightful statistics.
  • Serverless: Deploy without the need for traditional servers.
  • Customizable Slug: Support for personalized slugs.
  • ðŸª„ AI Slug: Leverage AI to generate slugs.
  • Link Expiration: Set expiration dates for your links.

entry.title: New release for Sink: v0.1.1
entry.content:
Features

  1. Add Dark Mode

What's Changed

  • Update README.md to fix typo by @BradBot1 in https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/pull/6
  • feat: switch theme by @QuentinHsu in https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/pull/12

New Contributors

  • @BradBot1 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/pull/6
  • @QuentinHsu made their first contribution in https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/pull/12

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/compare/v0.1.0...v0.1.1

entry.title: New release for Sink: v0.1.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: the links data loading on the mobile page did not trigger by @QuentinHsu in https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/pull/13
  • docs: Add simple API documentation by @tomcollis in https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/pull/17

New Contributors

  • @tomcollis made their first contribution in https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/pull/17

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/compare/v0.1.1...v0.1.2

entry.title: New release for Sink: v0.1.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Set Link page as Dashboard main page
  • Add URL Query writing function during redirection
  • Add link cache time configuration

New Contributors

  • @dr-data made their first contribution in https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/pull/23

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/compare/v0.1.2...v0.1.3

entry.title: New release for Sink: v0.1.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: improve slug readability by @fqd511 in https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/pull/28
  • feat: upgrade NuxtHub, optimize local development experience with hubAI, and upgrade the default model to llama-3.1

What's Fixed

  • fix: Login error https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/issues/44

New Contributors

  • @fqd511 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/pull/28

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/compare/v0.1.3...v0.1.4
